alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Stark County through 715 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Massillon to near Navarre to near Brewster. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Green, North Canton, Louisville, Minerva, Brewster, Navarre, Waynesburg, East Sparta, East Canton, Beach City, Meyers Lake, Hills And Dales, Robertsville, Maximo and Perry Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
